132  public function forward($controller, $action = "index", $params = array(), $initialize = false, $finalize = false) {
133  $u = array ($controller,$action );
134  if (\is_array ( $params )) {
135  $u = \array_merge ( $u, $params );
136  } else {
137  $u = \array_merge ( $u, [ $params ] );
138  }
139  Startup::runAction ( $u, $initialize, $finalize );
140  }
141 
155  public function redirectToRoute($routeName, $parameters = [], $initialize = false, $finalize = false) {
156  $path = Router::getRouteByName ( $routeName, $parameters );
157  if ($path !== false) {
158  $route = Router::getRoute ( $path, false );
159  if ($route !== false) {
160  $this->forward ( $route [0], $route [1], \array_slice ( $route, 2 ), $initialize, $finalize );
161  } else {
162  throw new RouterException ( "Route {$routeName} not found", 404 );
163  }
164  } else {
165  throw new RouterException ( "Route {$routeName} not found", 404 );
166  }
167  }
168 
174  public function getView() {
175  return $this->view;
176  }
177 }
